page.title: 12TREES/LOCAL HISTORY
page.content: {BEECH AND SILVER BIRCH)}ARE ABSENT.THERE IS HERE A GENEROUS SPRINKLING OF{HOLLY.}EPPING FOREST IS NOTED FOR HAVING ONE OF THE LARGEST COLLECTIONS OF{HORNBEAM}TREES IN EUROPE. {LOCAL HISTORY} IN THIS PART OF THE FOREST THERE IS A GRANITE PLINTH TO THE MEMORY OF{GIPSY {RODNEY SMITH MBE}WHO WAS SAID TO HAVE BEEN BORN UNDER A HORNBEAM TREE ADJACENT TO THE PLINTH. HE WAS A VERY WELL KNOWN MAN OF{RELIGION}BEING AN {EVANGELIST.}HE WAS BORN IN 1860 AND DIED IN 1947. THE STONE WAS UNVEILED C.1950. {THIS REFERS TO SQUARES 9&10 THIS AREA CONSISTS OF MAINLY THE BUSY {FOREST ROAD}AND{BLACKHORSE ROAD.}THESE ROADS ARE BOTH VERY NOISY ESPECIALLY IN THE RUSH HOUR DUE TO THE LORRIES,BUSES AND CARS TRAVELLING
